name: VCF (State Variable)
description:
This algorithm is a voltage controlled filter using the common ‘State Variable’ topology, which yields simultaneous low-, band-, and highpass filter responses. All three filter outputs are available individually, plus an output which can be blended from lowpass, through bandpass, to highpass.

The input and the various outputs use a contiguous range of busses, starting with the one set via the parameters, and with the channel count set by the ‘Width’ parameter. For example, to filter stereo signals, set the Width to 2.
use_cases: Manual frequency sweep with CV offset
Internal saturation to prevent unwanted distortion
Individual lowpass, bandpass, and highpass output routing
gui_description: The display simply shows the filter centre frequency in Hz and as a MIDI note number.

parameters.name: Blend
parameters.description: Sets the blend for the blended output.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: The number of busses to process.

parameters.name: MIDI_channel
parameters.description: Sets the MIDI channel on which to respond to note on events.

input_ports.name: Audio_input
input_ports.description: The audio input bus. Bus number is set by the Audio input parameter.

input_ports.name: Frequency_CV_input
input_ports.description: The frequency CV input bus (1V/octave). Bus number is set by the Frequency input parameter.

input_ports.name: Resonance_CV_input
input_ports.description: The resonance CV input bus. Scaled such that 5V corresponds to the full range. Bus number is set by the Resonance input parameter.

output_ports.name: Blended_output
output_ports.description: The output bus for the blended signal, which can be blended from lowpass through bandpass to highpass. Bus number and add/replace mode are set by Blended output and Blended mode parameters.

output_ports.name: Lowpass_output
output_ports.description: The output bus for the lowpass signal. Bus number and add/replace mode are set by Lowpass output and Lowpass mode parameters.

output_ports.name: Bandpass_output
output_ports.description: The output bus for the bandpass signal. Bus number and add/replace mode are set by Bandpass output and Bandpass mode parameters.

output_ports.name: Highpass_output
output_ports.description: The output bus for the highpass signal. Bus number and add/replace mode are set by Highpass output and Highpass mode parameters.
